ExtendedSection.Title: Properties used for the static export

Text.name: Text0
Text.content: Besides using the export property, you can mark a resource as internal to prevent export. Go to the workplace's explorer view, right-click the resource, choose "Advanced -> Secure/Export" in the context menu and check "Internal use only" in the appearing dialog. This setting is the strongest and will overwrite all other export settings. The option is not available for folders.
